ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.circular

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.layout.sequence.circular.Geometry

  • public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object
    Class of utilities for doing geometry-related operations. All methods here operate with coordinates in java coordinates (that is, y goes to negative values upwards).
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Geometry()

      Finds the point on the line defined from (x1,y1) to (x2,y2) that is closest to the point defined by (tx, ty).
      static java.awt.geom.Point2D findClosestOnRectangle(double topLeftX, double topLeftY, double width, double height, double tx, double ty)
      Finds closest point on rectangle defined by top-left = (topLeftX, topLeftY) and width/height to the point (tx, ty).

      Find displacement from "point" to intersection of circle of radius r (centered at circleCenter), along vector "direction".

                                           double height,
                                           double tx,
                                           double ty)
        Finds closest point on rectangle defined by top-left = (topLeftX, topLeftY) and width/height to the point (tx, ty). Operates in java coordinates with upwards y being negative.
        Parameters:
        topLeftX -
        topLeftY -
        width -
        height -
        tx -
        ty -
        Returns:
        The closest point to this rectangle.

      • findClosestOnLine

        public static java.awt.geom.Point2D findClosestOnLine(double x1,
                                      double y1,
                                      double x2,
                                      double y2,
                                      double tx,
                                      double ty)
        Finds the point on the line defined from (x1,y1) to (x2,y2) that is closest to the point defined by (tx, ty). Assumes coords in java coords.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The first x coord.
        y1 - The first y coord.
        x2 - The second x coord.
        y2 - The second y coord.
        Returns:
        The minimum distanced point the line to the origin.

      • findDisplacementToIntersection

        public static DisplacementSolution findDisplacementToIntersection(java.awt.geom.Point2D point,
                                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D direction,
                                                  java.awt.geom.Point2D circleCenter,
                                                  double radius)
        Find displacement from "point" to intersection of circle of radius r (centered at circleCenter), along vector "direction". Assumes coordinates in java coordinates (y values go negative in up direction).
        Parameters:
        point - The starting point from which to find the displacement.
        direction - The direction along which the displacement should be.
        circleCenter - The center of the circle to find the intersection with.
        radius - The radius of the circle centered at circleCenter.
        Returns:
        The (possibly multiple) displacements from "point" to the intersection of the circle of radius r, along vector "direction", or null if solution does not exist.
